name: WordOfTheDay
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word of the day
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill is perfect for learning to spell. With this skill you can get a word of the day to spell. Focusing on learning one new word each day and spelling that one word will build your spelling vocabulary and word recognition. Eventually you will become a master speller.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
